Override int [] edu.ou.asgbook.motion.HungarianAssigner.getAssignments ( int  cost[][],
int  maxcost 
)

Implements edu.ou.asgbook.motion.ObjectTracker.Assigner.

00031                                                            {
00032         // intialize result to be all unassigned
00033         int[] result = new int[cost.length];
00034         for (int i=0; i < result.length; ++i){
00035             result[i] = -1;
00036         }
00037         
00038         // if number of objects is zero, then can't do any assignment
00039         if (cost.length == 0 || cost[0].length == 0){
00040             return result;
00041         }
00042         
00043         if (cost[0].length < cost.length){
00044             // rotate so that we have more columns than rows
00045             int[][] rot = new int[ cost[0].length ][ cost.length ];
00046             for (int i=0; i < cost.length; ++i){
00047                 for (int j=0; j < cost[i].length; ++j){
00048                     rot[j][i] = cost[i][j];
00049                 }
00050             }
00051             // do the assignment process on rotated cost function
00052             int[] col_to_row = getAssignments(rot, maxcost);
00053             // fix result: we need row_to_col
00054             for (int col = 0; col < col_to_row.length; ++col){
00055                 int row = col_to_row[col];
00056                 if (row >= 0){
00057                     result[row] = col;
00058                 }
00059             }
00060             return result;
00061         }
00062 
00063         // threshold just in case some cost > maxcost
00064         for (int i=0; i < cost.length; ++i){
00065             for (int j=0; j < cost[i].length; ++j){
00066                 if (cost[i][j] > maxcost){
00067                     cost[i][j] = maxcost;
00068                 }
00069             }
00070         }
00071         HungarianMatch match = new HungarianMatch(cost);
00072         match.do_step1();
00073         match.do_step2();
00074         match.do_step3();
00075         for (int i=0; i < cost.length; ++i){
00076             for (int j=0; j < cost[i].length; ++j){
00077                 if (match.starred_zero[i][j] && cost[i][j] < maxcost ){
00078                     result[i] = j;
00079                 }
00080             }
00081         }
00082         return result;
00083     }

00313                                                             {
00314         // create output directory
00315         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("hungarian");
00316         
00317         // read
00318         File f = new File("data/seviri");
00319         Pair<LatLonGrid,Date>[] grids = SeviriInfraredTemperature.readAll(f);
00320         
00321         // do alg
00322         Segmenter seg = new ObjectTracker.SimpleSegmenter(100, 110, 1000);
00323         ObjectTracker alg = new ObjectTracker(seg, new ObjectTracker.CentroidDistance(), new HungarianAssigner());
00324         MedianFilter smoother = new MedianFilter(10);
00325         LatLonGrid grid0 = smoother.filter(grids[0].first);
00326         LatLonGrid grid1 = smoother.filter(grids[1].first);
00327         Pair<LatLonGrid,LatLonGrid> motion = alg.compute(grid0, grid1, out);
00328         
00329         // write
00330         SaturateFilter filter = new SaturateFilter(-150, 150);
00331         LatLonGrid u = filter.filter(motion.first);
00332         LatLonGrid v = filter.filter(motion.second);
00333         KmlWriter.write(u, out, "hungarian_u", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00334         KmlWriter.write(v, out, "hungarian_v", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00335     }
